cells.data:
|- app/
      |- css/
      |- fonts/
      |- images/ 
      |- index.html
      |- js/ 
      |- scss/
  |- dist/
  |- gulpfile.js
  |- node_modules/
  |- package.json

app : dev environment
dist : for production site
gulpfile.js : your gulp configs
node_modules : contains the packages/modules
package.json : contains metadata about your app/site
